16_on_center.name: 16 ON CENTER
projectCopy: Chicago’s 16 on Center is a hospitality group operating a wide range of restaurants and music venues, from the divey Empty Bottle to Michelin starred Dusek’s. As a graphic designer for the company, I worked within a variety of distinct identities to promote the group’s many events through primarily digital work.

Pilsen’s Punch House is the basement punch bar situated underneath Dusek’s and music venue Thalia Hall. After being approached by the bar’s music programming manager to create a new social media template, I set out to create a set that reflected Punch House’s modest identity while embracing the wide range of programming that the DJs bring.

bleach_day.name: BLEACH DAY
projectCopy: "Analog-obsessed"-Burlington, VT band Bleach Day released their second album "as if always" and reached out for a t-shirt design. The group wanted an illustration that would tie in with the album's visual identity of flowers, goldfish, and nostalgia.
The two-color design was printed in Burlington, VT.

projectMediae.altText: Bleach Day illustration with six televisions, flowers, and goldfish
T-shirt with Bleach Day illustration

cresco.name: CRESCO LABS
projectCopy: Cresco Labs, a leading cannabis company located in Chicago, IL, reached out to me in 2019 to create a promotional t-shirt design for St. Patrick’s Day. As a cannabis company, Cresco Labs is very familiar with the typical associations made with cannabis and, with an older demographic, they were looking for a clever design that their clientele would proudly wear on St. Patrick’s Day and beyond. The t-shirt was sent out to medicinal dispensaries around the country and given to Cresco’s loyal customers on St. Patrick’s Day.
Included here is the selected design and other options that were presented.

projectCopy: Eg Pottery is the Portland, OR-based business of potter Elana Grabel.

hope_all_is_well_presents.name: HOPE ALL IS WELL PRESENTS...
projectCopy: Burlington, VT-based Hope All is Well looks to fill the space between house shows and the bigger theaters that exist in a small, college town. Their shows focused on up-and-coming artists, both musically and visually. I created GIFs and posters for the group to promote the shows they put together throughout Burlington.

Instagram flyer animation for Varsity

interdigital_2019.name: INTERDIGITAL 2019
projectCopy: I had the privilege to create the annual reports for wireless and video technology company InterDigtial, Inc. in 2019 and 2020. The 2019 Annual Report created for the 2020 InterDigital, Inc. Shareholder Meeting focused on the company’s initiative to highlight the experience that their products facilitate.

The chosen photography and design looked to emphasize how their technology brings people together, whether it is through 5G wireless or virtual reality experiences and everything else in between. The visual identity of the report was inspired by the strong, vibrant colors of InterDigtial’s brand, while using a grid design that referenced the 2018 report I created but placed more focus on the interactions within the photos.

projectMediae.altText: InterDigital, Inc. 2019 Annual Report front and back
InterDigital, Inc. 2019 Annual Report page 2-3 spread
InterDigital, Inc. 2019 Annual Report page 4-5 spread
InterDigital, Inc. 2019 Annual Report page 6-7 spread

interdigital_2018.name: INTERDIGITAL 2018
projectCopy: The 2018 Annual Report created for the 2019 InterDigtial, Inc. Shareholder Meeting focused on the company’s growth in 5G technology. The visual identity of the report was inspired by the way that 5G delivers data, and how it “silently floats” over our heads while enabling so much of our modern lives.

groovy_tuna.name: GROOVY TUNA
projectCopy: I was approached by Rachel Vogrich of Groovy Tuna Goods to create a brand identity for her custom-made jewelry and art business. The logo set includes social media icons and alternative logos to be used for stickers, t-shirts, and business cards.

psyche.name: PSYCHE
projectCopy: Psyche Design Lab is a project created by Chris Stone that combines sustainability, outdoor gear, and vintage goods. Utilizing materials, from vintage Columbia jackets to Adidas tracksuits to old military-issued duffel bags, Psyche turns thrift finds into one-of-a-kind bags and accessories.
With a focus on vintage goods, and specifically the track jackets of the 80s, I looked to create a logo with bright colors and a retro type.

thalia_hall.name: THALIA HALL
projectCopy: Re-establishing in 2013, the 16 on Center property Thalia Hall has been a staple of the Chicago music scene. My role in this project was to create the brand assets and templates that are essential to the everyday marketing needs of the venue, ranging from digital advertisements to printed posters for inside and outside the venue.

This brand refresh project allowed the property to maintain its established brand while adding some character through a secondary type and burst of color. Continuing to build off a type-heavy brand, the new design presented a clean, modern sensibility while highlighting the eclectic range of acts that grace the stage.
